prompt: Generate the January 2026 financial statement pack for Alpha Trading AE (EL123456789). Banking reconciliation is complete, VAT return has been prepared, and EFKA contributions are calculated. Produce the P&L, balance sheet, and VAT summary.
expectations: Runs completeness gate check before attempting generation
Verifies banking reconciliation exists and is complete for January 2026
Verifies VAT filing data is available for the period
Confirms EFKA contribution data is present
Classifies income accounts under EGLS Class 7 (70-79)
Classifies expense accounts under EGLS Class 6 (60-69)
Produces P&L with correct Greek label: Î‘Ï€Î¿Ï„ÎµÎ»Î­ÏƒÎ¼Î±Ï„Î± Î§ÏÎ®ÏƒÎµÏ‰Ï‚
Produces balance sheet with correct Greek label: Î™ÏƒÎ¿Î»Î¿Î³Î¹ÏƒÎ¼ÏŒÏ‚
Balance sheet assets total equals equity plus liabilities total
VAT summary references actual submission data not estimated figures
Assigns version number v1 to the first generation
Writes machine-readable JSON to /data/clients/EL123456789/financial-statements/
Writes client-facing PDF to /data/reports/client/
Logs episode to /data/memory/episodes/

prompt: Try to generate the February 2026 financial statements for Beta Services OE (EL987654321). The banking reconciliation has not been completed yet and there are still 4 invoices pending in the OCR queue.
expectations: Runs completeness gate before attempting any generation
Detects banking reconciliation is missing for February 2026
Detects pending OCR items that have not been processed
Does NOT generate a partial statement â€” halts with blockers list
Outputs clear list of what is missing and what commands to run to resolve
Does not create any statement files for this period
Logs failure to /data/memory/failures/ with failure_type: completeness_gate_failed
Suggests openclaw statements blockers --afm EL987654321 --period 2026-02 for details
Does not use --force-partial without explicit human instruction

prompt: Generate an amendment to the October 2025 P&L for Gamma Constructions AE (EL555444333). A supplier invoice for EUR 2,400 was discovered that was not included in the original statement. The original v1 statement was issued to the client on 15/11/2025.
expectations: Detects that a v1 statement already exists and has been issued
Does NOT overwrite or modify the v1 statement
Creates a new v2 amendment with the corrected figures
Includes amendment notes: reason for change, what changed, original vs amended figures
Updates the financial-statements/index.json with the new v2 entry
Recalculates P&L with the additional EUR 2,400 expense correctly classified
Balance sheet updated to reflect the changed retained earnings figure
Logs the amendment as an episode with episode_type: amendment_issued
Both v1 and v2 files remain in /data/clients/EL555444333/financial-statements/
Produces new Greek PDF clearly marked as Î¤ÏÎ¿Ï€Î¿Ï€Î¿Î¯Î·ÏƒÎ· (Amendment) with reference to original

prompt: Run the January 2026 readiness report across all active clients to see who is ready for statement generation and who is still blocked.
expectations: Checks completeness gate status for every active client for January 2026
Lists clients who are READY: all data sources complete
Lists clients who are BLOCKED: with specific missing data items for each
Shows which blocking condition applies per client (banking, OCR, EFKA, prior period)
Provides a count summary: N ready, N blocked, N partial
Output is in English suitable for an accounting assistant to act on
Suggests specific openclaw commands to resolve each blocked client
Does not attempt to generate any statements as part of this command

prompt: Compare Alpha Trading AE (EL123456789) January 2026 P&L against January 2025 and flag any significant variances.
expectations: Reads v1 P&L for January 2026 from financial-statements directory
Reads v1 P&L for January 2025 from financial-statements directory
Calculates variance for each line item: absolute amount and percentage
Flags variances above threshold (default 15%) as significant
Groups variances by category: revenue, cost of sales, operating expenses
Presents in plain English with Greek account labels alongside English labels
Notes if prior year statement does not exist and handles gracefully
Output is readable by an accounting assistant without accounting training

prompt: A balance sheet was generated for Delta Services EPE (EL777888999) for December 2025 but when reviewed, total assets are EUR 142,300 and total equity plus liabilities are EUR 139,850. The balance sheet does not balance. What should happen?
expectations: Identifies this as a balance sheet mismatch â€” assets do not equal equity plus liabilities
Calculates the difference: EUR 2,450
Does NOT issue the statement â€” halts immediately on mismatch detection
Logs a high-priority failure to /data/memory/failures/ with failure_type: balance_sheet_mismatch
Alerts the senior accountant through the dashboard
Does not attempt to auto-correct the difference
Provides the specific figures: assets EUR 142,300 vs equity+liabilities EUR 139,850, difference EUR 2,450
Suggests checking for unrecorded liabilities, misclassified accounts, or data entry errors
Never issues an unbalanced balance sheet even as a draft without explicit force flag
